GSD.product_version: versions from v4.16 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
scsi: hpsa: Fix possible memory leak in hpsa_init_one()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit c808edbf580bfc454671cbe66e9d7c2e938e7601, it was introduced in version v4.16 by commit 8b834bff1b73dce46f4e9f5e84af6f73fed8b0ef. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: scsi: hpsa: Fix possible memory leak in hpsa_init_one()
